headline: Is It Time To Reassess Equinix (EQIX) After Its Strong Recent Share Price Run?
summary: If you are trying to figure out whether Equinix is fairly priced or not, this article will walk through what the current data says about its valuation and how to interpret it. Equinix shares last closed at US$945.64, with a 1.1% decline over 7 days, a 19.5% return over 30 days, 23.8% year to date, 6.4% over 1 year, 45.2% over 3 years and 59.9% over 5 years. Recent coverage around Equinix has focused on its role as a global data center and interconnection provider, which helps frame how...

headline: Data Center Market Competitive Analysis Report 2025: Key Players Analysis, Profiles, Strategic Developments, Product Launches, Sustainability, Mergers, Innovations, Revenue, and Forecasts to 2033
summary: The global Data Center Market is projected to grow significantly, from US$ 263.48 billion in 2025 to US$ 613.36 billion by 2033, with a CAGR of 11.14%. This growth is driven by the rise of cloud computing, data-driven technologies, and the need for secure data storage. Key manufacturers include Delta Electronics, Cisco Systems, Equinix, Fujitsu, General Electric, and others, who offer advanced solutions to meet industry demands. headline: Agentic AI Foundation Welcomes 97 New Members As Demand for Open, Collaborative Agent Standardization Increases
summary: The Linux Foundation Member Summit - The Agentic AI Foundation (AAIF), the open foundation driving the transparent and collaborative evolution of agentic AI, today announced the addition of 18 new Gold Members and 79 new Silver Members. The AAIF now represents a community of 146 members collaborating to advance open protocols, tooling and best practices for agent-based AI systems.
